Comment 5: 
https://golang.org/cl/7707043/ removes the special rule in the spec for shifts,
and makes the 1st example illegal:

var s uint
var x = 1<<s != 0.1

6g correctly reports the error.

(The 2nd example (1.0<<s != 0) becomes illegal with the spec change - I will file
an independent issue against gc).
